alert.note: Alert for Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:46PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lake and northern Klamath Counties through 915 PM PDT... At 846 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Crescent, or 19 miles south of La Pine, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Lake and northern Klamath Counties. This includes Highway 31 in Oregon between mile markers 4 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
